valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Bacch. 4, 4, 53</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quid te igitur rettulit Beneficum esse oratione, si, etc.,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,009:1:2:13" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Ep. 1, 2, 13</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">neque refert videre, quid dicendum sit, nisi, etc.,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,039:29:110" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Brut. 29, 110</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">neque enim numero comprehendere refert,</quote> <trans><tr>nor indeed is it necessary</tr>, <tr>need we</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,002:2:104" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> G. 2, 104</bibl></cit>: nec dicaris aliquid, quod referret scire, reticuisse, Cael. ap. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,056:8:10:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Fam. 8, 10, 2</bibl>.—With <pb n="1546" /> <cb n="REFE" /> <hi rend="ital">inf. pass.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">jam nec mutari pabula refert,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,002:3:548" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> G. 3, 548</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">plures e familiā cognosci referre arbitror,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=nero:1" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Ner. 1</bibl></cit>. — With <hi rend="ital">a rel. subj.-clause</hi> (so most freq. in the class. per.): <cit><quote lang="la">ipsi animi magni refert quali in corpore locati sint,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,049:1:33:80" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Tusc. 1, 33, 80</bibl></cit>: magni refert, hic quid velit, Caes. ap. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,057:14:1:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Att. 14, 1, 2</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">cum ego ista omnia bona dixero, tantum refert, quam magna dicam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,048:5:30:90" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Fin. 5, 30, 90</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quasi vero referat quam id saepe fiat,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,053:2:29:62" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Div. 2, 29, 62</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quid refert, quā me ratione cogatis?</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,052:8:26" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Lael. 8, 26</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quid refert, utrum voluerim fieri, an gaudeam factum?</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,035:2:12:29" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Phil. 2, 12, 29</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quid refert, tanto post ad judices deferantur, an omnino non deferantur?</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> Fl. 9, 21</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quae (aves) pascantur nec ne, quid refert?</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,053:2:34:72" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Div. 2, 34, 72</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">tuo vitio rerumne labores, Nil referre putas?</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,004:1:2:77" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> S. 1, 2, 77</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">cum referre negas, quali sit quisque parente Natus,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 1, 6, 7</bibl></cit> et saep.: <cit><quote lang="la">quod tu istis lacrimis te probare postulas, Non pluris refert, quam si imbrem in cribrum geras,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,016:1:1:100" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Ps. 1, 1, 100</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">tantum retulerit, ut in transferendis seminibus similem statum caeli locique observemus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:3:9:7" default="NO"><author>Col.</author> 3, 9, 7</bibl></cit>. — </sense><sense id="n40792.4" n="(g)" level="5"> <hi rend="ital">Refert</hi>, etc.: <hi rend="ital">Do.</hi> Hae (tabellae) quid ad me? <hi rend="ital">To.</hi> Immo ad te attinent, Et tuā refert, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,014:4:3:28" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Pers. 4, 3, 28</bibl>: <hi rend="ital">Ep.</hi> Tua pol refert enim? <hi rend="ital">Ge.</hi> Si quidem meā refert, operā utere, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,018:4:2:36" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Stich. 4, 2, 36</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">quid tuā refert, qui cum istac venerit?</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,011:5:2:65" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Merc. 5, 2, 65</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">non plus suā referre, quam si, etc.,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Quint. 5, 19</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quos, cum nihil refert, pudet,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,009:2:1:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Ep. 2, 1, 1</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">cum nihilo pluris referet, quam si, etc.,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,004:3:4:20" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Bacch. 3, 4, 20</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">nego et negando si quid refert, ravio,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,015:3:5:33" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Poen. 3, 5, 33</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">si servus est, numquid refert?</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,016:2:4:28" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Ps. 2, 4, 28</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quid refert, si hoc ipsum salsum illi et venustum videbatur?</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,050:1:28:79" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> N. D. 1, 28, 79</bibl></cit> et saep. — * </sense><sense id="n40792.5" n="(d)" level="5"> Entirely <hi rend="ital">absol.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">bona Sejani ablata aerario, ut in fiscum cogerentur, tamquam referret,</quote> <trans><tr>as though it mattered</tr>, <tr>as if there were any difference</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:6:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 6, 2</bibl></cit>.— </sense><sense id="n40792.6" n="II" level="1"> Analogous to attinet, conducit, and interest; <hi rend="ital">it is of importance; it belongs</hi>, <hi rend="ital">relates</hi>, <hi rend="ital">concerns</hi>, etc.; constr., <hi rend="ital">refert hoc</hi>, <hi rend="ital">id</hi>, etc. (once <hi rend="ital">referunt haec</hi>), <hi rend="ital">ad aliquem</hi>, <hi rend="ital">alicui</hi>, <hi rend="ital">alicujus</hi>, etc. (mostly ante-class. and post-Aug.; but, with alicujus, once in Sall. and once in Liv.): quam ad rem istuc refert? Plaut Ep. 2, 2, 91; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">quid id ad me aut ad meam rem refert,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> Pers. 4, 3, 44</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">refert etiam ad fructus, quemadmodum vicinus in confinio consitum agrum habeat,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0684,001:R. R. 1:16" default="NO"><author>Varr.</author> R. R. 1, 16 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit>— In <number>plur.</number>: <cit><quote lang="la">te ex puellā prius percontari volo, Quae ad rem referunt,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,014:4:4:44" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Pers. 4, 4, 44</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quoi rei id te assimulare rettulit?</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,020:2:4:40" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Truc. 2, 4, 40</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">dic, quid referat intra Naturae fines viventi, jugera centum an Mille aret?</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,004:1:1:49" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> S. 1, 1, 49</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quin et verba Flavii vulgabantur, non referre dedecori, si citharoedus demoveretur et tragoedus succederet,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:15:65" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 15, 65</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">faciundum aliquid, quod illorum magis quam suā retulisse videretur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:J.111:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Sall.</author> J.111, 1</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">praefatus ... et ipsorum referre, si quos suspectos status praesens rerum faceret,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:34:27:6" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 34, 27, 6</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quorum nihil refert, ubi litium cardo vertatur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:12:8:2" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 12, 8, 2</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">neque refert cujusquam, Punicas Romanasve acies laetius extuleris,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:4:33"
